post:
FireVPS is a child initiative of ASTGD. Its main aim to provide a high quality virtual private server to its client with high specifications. FireVPS is also working to provide easy to use packages for SAAS. ASTGD is a registered software development company in Bangladesh since 2005.

You will get Virtualizor control panel with all our VPS plans. All VPS users get dedicated IPv4 and IPv6 with full control over RDNS and no ports are blocked unless some abuse is being done.

#FireVPS KVM yearly & monthly offer
-1024MB DDR3 RAM  
-2x vCPU  
-100GB HDD disk  
-2TB transfer  
-1Gbps Network  
-1x IPv4  
-KVM/Virtualizor  
-Original price: $100/year or $9.99/month  
**-Offer price: $19.99/year or 2.50/month**  

**Yearly Order Link: [link] (https://firevps.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=8&billingcycle=annually&promocode=LET1YEAR)**  

**Monthly Order Link: [link] (https://firevps.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=8&billingcycle=monthly&promocode=LET1024)**  

For any questions or modifications to plans needed contact **support@firevps.net** or reply to this thread. SKYPE: mailbusiness (Service time 11 AM to 7 PM +6 GMT)  

Thanks
